title: Continuation of the National Emergency With Respect to the Proliferation of Weapons of Mass Destruction
summary: The Presidential Documents notice of November 5, 2025, announces the continuation of the national emergency concerning the proliferation of weapons of mass destruction. This emergency, initially declared on November 14, 1994, via Executive Order 12938 and subsequently amended, addresses the unusual and extraordinary threat posed by the spread of nuclear, biological, and chemical weapons and their delivery systems to U.S. national security, foreign policy, and economy. The notice, in accordance with the National Emergencies Act, extends this emergency for another year beyond November 14, 2025.
